text: Ikuyena lapho umthandazo uyiqiniso khona futhi labo abamemeza abanye esikhundleni sakhe ababaphenduli ngalutho ngaphandle njengalowo owelulela izandla zakhe zombili emanzini ukuze afinyelele emlonyeni wakhe kepha wona akafinyeleli kuyena, umthandazo wabangakholwayo awulutho ngaphandle kokuthi ungukuduka
